apiDocs.title: API Documentation
apiDocs.description: View the technical documentation for developers
apiDocs.pageSubtitle: Free and open API for real-time currency conversion and historical exchange rates
apiDocs.aboutText: This API provides endpoints for currency conversion, historical exchange rates, and currency information. All data is cached for 1 hour to optimize performance. The API is free to use and doesn't require authentication.
apiDocs.rateLimitsText: No rate limits are currently enforced. However, please use the API responsibly. Data is cached for 1 hour, so repeated requests within that timeframe will return cached results.
